title: User Authentication System
description: The system must provide secure user authentication functionality including login, logout, and session management. Users should be able to authenticate using email and password credentials. The system must enforce password complexity requirements and provide account lockout after failed attempts.

history.title: Basic User Login
history.description: The system should allow users to log in with username and password.

title: Data Export Functionality
description: Users must be able to export their data in multiple formats including CSV, JSON, and PDF. The export should include all user-generated content and maintain data integrity. Large exports should be processed asynchronously with email notifications.

title: Mobile Responsive Design
description: The application interface must be fully responsive and functional on mobile devices with screen sizes from 320px to 768px. Touch interactions should be optimized and navigation should be thumb-friendly.

history.title: Mobile Support
history.description: The app should work on mobile phones.

history.title: Mobile Compatibility
history.description: The application should be compatible with mobile devices and tablets. Basic responsive design is required.
